description:
This course covers everything from the basic ways DJ use Ableton Live to mix their sets. It includes unique ideas to  capitalise on Ableton Live's amazing performance features with lectures that are fully transferable to any version of Ableton Live. The course also comes with warping lectures for any type of music file including:

  • House
  • Techno
  • Trance
  • Drum & Bass
  • Dubstep
  • Ambient
  • IDM
  • Live Music
  • Acapellas

Requirements: PC or Mac running any version of Ableton Live. Demos are available here.
title: DJ with Ableton Live (includes a full warping course)
